title: The Good news is water
brief_description: Outlines the work of UNICEF in providing a permanent, clear water supply to a village in Imo State in Eastern Nigeria. The installation of such a water supply will combat cholera, diarrhoea and guinea worm contracted from using contaminated water holes.
